name: Dragon's Lair III: The Curse of Mordread
storyline: After destroying the evil wizard Mordroc in his bid for marriage to your beloved Daphne in "Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp", Mordrdoc's evil sister Mordread is demanding revenge. You, as Dirk the Daring, must test your skills as you are thrust into a frantic quest thought time to save Daphne and the children. But you must hurry before the evil witch Mordread traps them forever in the Vortex of Eternity
summary: Dragon's Lair III: The Curse of Mordread brings the classical animation style of Don Bluth to your computer featuring full-screen computer animation, digitized sound and new animations not incluided in the original laser disc arcade game
